mdRecord.dcterms:title: Culture & anarchy: an essay in political and social criticism; and Friendship's garland, being the conversations, letters, and opinions of the late Arminius, baron von Thunderten-Tronckh / Collected and ed., with a dedicatory letter to Adolescens Leo, esq., of "The Daily telegraph", by Matthew Arnold
Friendship's garland
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Arnold, Matthew, 1822-1888
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Original red cloth; front hinge split; backstrip torn and heavily sunned. From the Library of Edwin A. Alderman, with his signature and bookplate on front pastedown. Item X000501300 has bookplate data: Edwin Anderson Alderman.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Alderman, Edwin Anderson, 1861-1931--Library--Personal copy.
